page.title: 0711TH. SIGNAL REGIMENT
page.content: The 11th. Signal Regiment is the only place in the country where signalmen receive their basic military training. About 30 recruits enter the camp every fortnight and are taught basic training for 10 weeks.They are confined to barracks for 3 to4 weeks. They learn to march,salute,look after and wear their uniform properly, keeping fit by jogging,assualt courses and P.T. instruction. They also learn how to use weapons and how to give first aid.They live in a room containing five beds,which they must clean,in a large barrack block. The signals have a cap badge called {Jimmy}he was a message carrier for the gods and became the Signal's badge because he was quick.The Signal motte is {CERTA CITO}which means swift and sure.The men obtain this badge when they learn to salute correctly.
